answer: The digital credentials and certificates issued by the WHO Academy are designed to be viewed and shared online 📜 You also have the option to download your Certificates and print them out as needed 🤓
answer_formatted: The digital credentials and certificates issued by the WHO Academy are designed to be viewed and shared online 📜 You also have the option to download your Certificates and print them out as needed 🤓
